Text.Page:
You're on orders from Dirken, eh? A likely story.

With all due respect, mighty , you don't look like Dirken's type. Your hands are too clean.

You get your hands bloody killing some {@LinkCreature:12#2#bay kamaras} and {@LinkCreature:12#3#arachnen stalkers}, and then we'll talk. No matter who you work for, you gotta like a clean beach, right?

You actually cleaned up the beach, just like I asked.

That's some kind of crazy, ask-no-questions loyalty you've got there, .

With a "just following orders" attitude like that, you probably are working for Dirken. In his crew, thinking for yourself is often fatal.
